attributes.action: once gain screen the male population for prostate cancer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My father has been diagnosed as having advanced prostate cancer. A very worrying time for his nearest and dearest. Dad is 75, but we have been informed that, he could have had this disease from as early as his fifties! Screening from an early age, could surely have prevented the way in which my dad ends his life.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
